meanings.sent1: She reshapes the clay into a new sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The artist reshapes the painting to make it more modern.
meanings.sent3: He reshapes the sandcastle into a tiny village.
meanings.sent4: Time reshapes our memories like a sculptor with clay.
meanings.sent5: The wind reshapes the sand dunes into beautiful patterns.

meanings.definition: To change the form or structure of something.
meanings.sent1: The tailor reshapes the dress to fit perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The earthquake reshapes the landscape dramatically.
meanings.sent3: The chef reshapes the pancake into a funny face.
meanings.sent4: Laughter reshapes a gloomy mood into happiness.
meanings.sent5: The river reshapes the rocks over time with its flow.
